title: Trundle back to the meta?
body:
Hello Riot and League of Legends player :)

I really like to play Trundle, but unfortunately, he's immobiel af. It will be really cool, if you Riot rework him. E.g. His E could knock up in a bigger area. Additional it will be also rather cool, if he can jump to his E by repressing it. At last he could jump to one place in his W.

replies.body: They allready increased the knockup, hat nicht viel helped.
